remarks: Transfer eventual boundedness from a larger function to a smaller function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Sep-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
statement:
o1le.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
o1le.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. O(1) ) $.
o1le.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
o1le.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
o1le.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ M <_ x ) ) -> ( abs ` C ) <_ ( abs ` B ) ) $.
o1le $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
